testimonials.text: I mentored Anuraj during GSSoC'20 for the CropAi project.He worked on the frontend section of the project under me, which included designing, developing, and adding logic to design. Some of the technologies he worked on are git, Github, vanilla JS, bootstrap 4, CSS, HTML, and designing-tools (like Adobe Xd/Figma, etc.). His contribution is praised, and it aided in completing the project. He submitted all the work assigned to him well in time. I wish him the very best for his future.
You have worked really hard during Mern Stack development Tranning.You need to showcase your skills to the world,Best of luck for your Future.
